snippet: The book promises to explore the “contrast between my public respect, bipartisanship and calm, and my private frustration, disgust and anger.”
abstract: Robert M Gates, former defense secretary under Pres George W Bush and Pres Obama, will write memoir entitled Duty, to be published in January 2014 by Knopf.
lead_paragraph: The book promises to explore the “contrast between my public respect, bipartisanship and calm, and my private frustration, disgust and anger.”

headline.main: Robert Gates to Write ‘Duty,’ About His Time as Defense Secretary
